workflows.name: [EFD] European Football Daily
workflows.description: v3.0.0 - AI-powered European football news automation using Gemini with Google Search grounding. Two-stage discovery: (1) searches trending topics from last 24 hours, (2) deep researches selected topic for stats and sources. Generates cinematic infographics with team logos and stat overlays, plus Facebook posts with numbered source citations.
workflows.instructions: Runs daily at 00:00 via n8n Schedule Trigger. Uses Gemini 2.0 Flash with google_search tool for real-time news discovery. Produces image with text overlay and FB post with [1], [2] style citations linking to sources.
workflows.architecture: Webhook → Discover Topics (Gemini+GoogleSearch) → Topic Analyst → Compliance Checker → Research Topic → Stats Extraction → Post Generation → Image Pipeline → Imagen API → Callback

workflows.name: [FVP] Football Video Pipeline
workflows.description: AI-powered research, curation, and video content generation pipeline for European football news. Three-phase workflow: (1) News Hound discovers top 3 viral topics via Gemini web search, (2) Deep Diver verifies each topic with additional sources, (3) Journalist writes 150-word summaries. Then generates a 65-second video script with intro slide + 3 news segments (20s each), plus image generation prompts for each scene.
workflows.instructions: Runs daily at 00:00 via n8n Schedule Trigger or on-demand via webhook. Uses Gemini 2.5 Flash for all AI steps with rate limiting between calls. Produces structured JSON output with video script, image prompts, and timing data.
workflows.architecture: Webhook/Schedule → News Hound (Gemini Search) → Deep Diver (Loop+Verify) → Journalist (Summarize) → Video Architect (Script) → Image Stylist (Prompts) → Callback
